content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d36e3439-c4d6-4c9e-af99-be0d151e692d/How%20to%20communicate.png?preview=true\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":563,\"height\":307},\"align\":\"align-center\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"For many of your team members, you’ll be a primary source of information. Your people will ask and expect you to provide company updates or to clarify things they don’t understand or don’t know. The way you get and transmit corporate information will directly influence how people understand the place where they work: EPAM.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"                      YOU SPEAK FOR THE COMPANY, EVEN IF YOU THINK YOU DON'T\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Direct managers and supervisors are \\\"the employer\\\" to most employees. That is, people may shape their opinion of an entire organization based on the day-to-day relationships they have with their managers or supervisors, whether positive or negative. Additionally, your words carry weight as a representative of the company. Be mindful of both what you say and how you say it.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"One of your goals is to make sure that your teammates stay on top of all the relevant corporate updates; for this, you need to follow corporate announcements, understand how they can affect your team members, transfer information to your resource pool properly, and make sure that your team clearly understands companywide changes and programs.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the same time, one other goal of yours is to make the results of your teams visible to the global EPAM community. This means informing the company and senior managers about your team’s successes and achievements to make the work of your reports recognized and meaningful.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Frequency of Communication\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As a Resource Manager, you are the first person who your reports will turn to when they need help, so you will want to build connections with each of your teammates to provide them with necessary support and guidance. Meaningful personal connections with your people are the basis of thoughtful leadership that results in better engagement and performance. This includes getting to know them as people (to the extent they are comfortable sharing), understanding what motivates them/gets them excited about coming to work, what is a goal they are working towards and do they need support from you to achieve it, etc.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The best tool for connecting with your reports is regular 1-on-1 meetings. These calls can help you collect and deliver necessary information, assist with key decisions, emphasize the urgency of required actions, mitigate risks and increase people’s loyalty to the company and project. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here’s some advice on how often to conduct your 1-on-1s:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Agree with each employee on a comfortable frequency of your talks and set the recurring meetings via Outlook (we recommend having your 1-on-1s with each of your reports at least once a month)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note that frequency may change depending on employee’s risk of leaving (the higher the risk is, the more frequent check-ins are)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On top of regular 1-on-1s, Feedback talks are expected to happen at least twice a year and/or anytime there is a change in the project\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Calls need to be taken if requested by employees\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{\"checked\":false},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Calls are expected to happen immediately if there is a performance/conduct issue to address \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1-on-1 Tips and Advice\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When preparing and conducting your 1-on-1s, you may find it useful to consider the following steps:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Before the talk\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Review the previous notes that have been put into employee’s Telescope profile (these can include your own notes, as well as those from conversations they may have had with the People Team and/or superiors in your reporting line)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"During the talk\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask about changes/news in employee’s life and address any questions/topics the person brings up \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Discuss employee's current project and satisfaction with the team\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Share Org Updates and news (if any) and explain what these changes mean for the employee \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask about employee’s aspirations, agree on the priorities and help set out the career path\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ask if there are any blockers the person needs help removing/offer help as needed\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After the talk\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Record the main takeaways and agreements on the Wall in the employee Telescope profile. This especially relates to the calls when you give feedback or agree on action items/next steps, when you’re working on planning an employee’s career, if the risk of employee’s leaving changes or in case of any other important topics/ changes that were brought up during your 1-on-1. Recording your talks in Telescope is crucial and helps keep employee records in one place to easily track changes/address concerns. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#A72014\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Telescope talks can partially be visible to employees (if you add notes to the “Notes for employee” section) so be mindful of the details you’re including there. You can add more details in the “Notes for managers only” section which is visible for HR staff and management only.\\r It’s also important to remember that NO sensitive, personal, or medical data is to be recorded in Telescope.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":477752,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/454e2ed3-528b-4ad6-8527-c4736055b7dc/Screen
